Reviews.Title: Great phone for the price
Reviews.Author: imknattie "miss knattie"
Reviews.Content: Seller's description was accurate.  Transaction was smooth and received it in a timely manner.  With a bunch of kids I thought it was safer as a mom to have an older model iphone that I could take to the repair shop that wouldn't cost and arm and a leg to fix if something happened. Which in fact did, Two days after I got it I accidentally dropped it and the home button stopped working.  I took it to my local cell phone repair shop and it was fixed and now works great again.  I'm happy with my purchase.

Reviews.Title: Unlocked iPhone 3g from Amazon.com
Reviews.Author: Andy Effiong
Reviews.Content: The phone was very good, but the USB cable and the charging modem were weak. I could not return them because I had already sent them to my wife who is outside the USA. I believe next purchases from the seller will be well tested and any anomaly corrected before shipment to buyers.Andy Effiong.

Reviews.Title: iphone
Reviews.Author: Synthia A. Morales
Reviews.Content: Phone was what I was looking for.  The function on it are nice even if this is an older model but serves its purpose.

Reviews.Title: WiFi NOT WORKING
Reviews.Author: Natalie Fulchan
Reviews.Content: The phone came with the WiFi not working. After using the phone for about a week, the ringer also stop working. I guess, it has some hardware problems.

Reviews.Title: This phone doesn't work at all.
Reviews.Author: Sooyoung Ellie Lee
Reviews.Content: I tried to fix this phone in like 100 ways but didn't work and I missed the return expiration date.

Reviews.Title: Good
Reviews.Author: Scarlet
Reviews.Content: the product was in good external condition, ihave to change the antena to see how it work so i can get better opinion
